meanings.definition: A group of people united in a common purpose or interest.
meanings.sent1: The confraternities in our neighborhood work together to keep the streets clean.
meanings.sent2: The confraternities of artists gathered to showcase their paintings at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The confraternities of bakers decided to have a doughnut-making competition.
meanings.sent4: The confraternities of birds chirped in harmony at the break of dawn.
meanings.sent5: The confraternities of students collaborated on a science project and won first place.

meanings.definition: An association, especially a religious one.
meanings.sent1: The confraternities of monks prayed together every morning in the chapel.
meanings.sent2: The confraternities of nuns dedicated their lives to serving the community.
meanings.sent3: The confraternities of chefs held a cook-off to determine the best pasta dish.
meanings.sent4: The confraternities of stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The confraternities of musicians performed a beautiful symphony for the audience.
